channel.title: Blockstack for macOS Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Blockstack v0.6.0
item.description: This release features a beautiful new Wallet app, improvements to the registration process and automatic updates on macOS.

item.title: Blockstack v0.6.1
item.description:
This release features a beautiful new Wallet app, improvements to the registration process and automatic updates on macOS.

This release also includes the following improvements:

  • Adds storage menu item and fixes wallet menu item in macOS app #385
  • Fixes a problem displaying the wallet address #386

item.title: Blockstack v0.6.2
item.description:
This release features a beautiful new Wallet app, improvements to the registration process and automatic updates on macOS.

This release also includes the following improvements:

  • Fixes bug that prevented new account creation #392

item.title: Blockstack v0.7.0
item.description: This release features improved integration with Blockstack Core along with security and (local) logging.

item.title: Blockstack v0.8.0
item.description: This release features a release candidate of Blockstack Core 0.14.2, increased test coverage and stability improvements.

item.title: Blockstack v0.8.1
item.description:
This release features a release candidate of Blockstack Core 0.14.2, increased test coverage and stability improvements.

  • Fixes authentication issue.
